scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc src/modeliv.ts -t es3 --m commonjs --sourceMap -d --outDir bin && npm run lint
scripts.watch: npm run clean && tsc src/modeliv.ts -t es3 --m commonjs --sourceMap -d --outDir bin && npm run lint
scripts.build-tests: echo tsc src/tests/spec.ts -t es5 --jsx preserve --m commonjs --inlineSourceMap --outDir bin && npm run lint
scripts.watch-tests: echo start tsc src/tests/spec.ts -t es5 --jsx preserve --m commonjs --inlineSourceMap --outDir bin --watch
scripts.test: npm run build-tests && npm run test-phantom
scripts.test-chrome: npm run build-tests && karma start --single-run --browsers Chrome
scripts.test-require: npm run build && npm install -g . && npm ls -g && cd test && node test-require.js && cd .. && npm remove -g .
scripts.publish-patch: npm run build && npm run build-tests && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build && npm run build-tests && npm version minor && npm publish
